I love to support my local community by buying fresh produce from the farmers market.
I want to learn how to cook more healthy meals because I know fast food isn't good for my health.
I enjoy celebrating Thanksgiving with my friends in Chicago.
i enjoy watching baseball.
my brother is currently couch surfing at my house.

participant_2.background:
I have a classic car that my friends love to ride in when we go out.
i am a childrens librarian.
I am prone to spending hours researching random topics online.
I have a Honda Civic Hybrid because it's fuel-efficient and spacious enough for my sister and me to explore new places.
i am a closet cannibal.

content.text: Hi, what do you do for a living?
I am a children's librarian!
That's awesome! I love reading, and I think it's so important to encourage kids to read.
Thanks! I do too. I love helping kids find books they'll love and getting them excited about reading.
I'm glad to hear that. I think it's a really important job.
Thanks! I'm glad I'm able to do it.
What are some of your favorite books?
I have a lot of favorite books, but some of my favorites include The Giver, To Kill a Mockingbird, and The Hobbit.
Those are all great books! I've read all of them, and I loved them all.
Me too! I'm always happy to find someone who has read the same books I have.
Yeah, it's always fun to talk about books with someone who has read them too.
I agree. It's nice to be able to share your love of books with someone else.
Do you have any recommendations for books I should read?
Sure! I would recommend The Hunger Games series, The Harry Potter series, and The Percy Jackson series.
I've heard good things about those books. I'll have to check them out.
I hope you enjoy them!
Thanks! I'm sure I will.
No problem! Let me know if you have any questions about them.
I will! Thanks for talking to me.
You're welcome! I had fun talking to you too.
